com.jalios.jcms

Class MailSender

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.jalios.util.MailSender
      • com.jalios.jcms.MailSender
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    JcmsConstants, JaliosConstants, java.lang.Runnable
    Deprecated. 
    use MailMessage instead

    @Deprecated
public class MailSender
extends MailSender
implements JcmsConstants
    This class spawns a thread which sends a mail to a set of recipients. Once all the mail has been sent, it can send an acknowledge.
    Version:
    $Revision: 70800 $
    Author:
    Olivier Dedieu
